document.full_text: rains over the last week brought some relief to the drought-ravaged southern plains, though parts of texas saw the worst of the drought actually expand, a report from u.s. climatologists said on thursday.
document.title: rains partly relieve drought in southern states
lines_and_colors: rains over the last week brought some relief to the drought-ravaged southern plains, though parts of texas saw the worst of the drought actually expand, a report from u.s. climatologists said on thursday.
